Row.Text: Gain 500 Railroad Tycoon Points from manufacturing goods in your Factories. These Points are earned each turn for each Factory Resource that is slotted into a Settlement with a Factory and connected to your Rail or Port network.
Congratulations, you won an Economic Victory!
Use John Maynard to establish the World Bank in all other player's capitals. Cost of establishment is cheaper for each Economic Legacy Point you have earned throughout the campaign.
Gain 20 Ideology Points from conquering Settlements for the first time. Gain 1 Point before you have an Ideology, 2 Points with an Ideology, or 3 Points against an opponent with a different Ideology.
Congratulations, you won a Military Victory!
Complete the Manhattan Project, and then complete the Operation Ivy Project. Both are cheaper for each Militaristic Legacy Point you have earned throughout the campaign.
Congratulations, you won a Science Victory!
Complete the First Crewed Space Flight Project. The Project is cheaper for each Scientific Legacy Point you have earned throughout the campaign.
Congratulations, you won a Culture Victory!
Complete the World's Fair Wonder. The World's Fair is cheaper for each Cultural Legacy Point you have earned throughout the campaign.
